Title: Relates to quality improvement and increased consumer transparency in assisted living residences
Summary: Requires reporting and posting by assisted living facilities relating to quality measures and information concerning rates, rent, and service fees; requires a scoring system of the assisted living quality reporting.
LawCode: Amd ยง4656, Pub Health L (as proposed in S.8865 & A.5790-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to quality improvement and increased consumer transparency in assisted living residences
